column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends his final medical board examination in Kingston-upon-Hull.
* 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mrs Souch.
* 2009 - Halifirien: The Hallowed Mountain is released online.

column2: The Tolkien Trust and HarperCollins settle their lawsuit with New Line Cinema and the Saul Zaentz Company.

column1: * 2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online Allies of the King
column2: "Ride of the Grey Company" is released in North America
column3: which includes free-to-play for current and former subscribers.

column1: * 2016 - Oxonmoot 2016 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
